text: Ituri is one of the 26 provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Its capital is Bunia. ==Geography== The Ituri Rainforest is in this area. It is located northeast of the Ituri River and on the western side of Lake Albert. It has borders with Uganda and South Sudan. The five administrative territories of Ituri are: * Aru (6,740 km2) * Djugu (8,184 km2) * Irumu (8,730 km2) * Mahagi (5,221 km2) * Mambasa (36,783 km2) ==References== Category:Provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:2015 establishments in Africa
title: Ituri Province
